attributes.action: Start a determined educational initiative to abolish the use of the F word in children's vocabulary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is an awful indictment on our society that so many people use words which begin with 'F'on a very regular and frequent basis in conversational English.
This has come in large part from TV and Cinema.
Let us set about the task of cleaning up our glorious language by starting in our schools and colleges.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
